name: YouTubeUtils
description: Play videos at the highest quality, dynamically resize video player, extra hotkeys such as to loop video, and more!

scripts.tar: tar czvf YouTubeUtils.tar.gz src public vite.config.mts package.json tsconfig.json pnpm-lock.yaml README_FIREFOX.md
scripts.fire: web-ext run -s dist -t firefox-android --adb-device $(adb devices | sed -n 2p | awk '{print $1}') --firefox-apk org.mozilla.fenix --adb-remove-old-artifacts
